stories.original_headline: Why evolution rewarded ants that sacrificed protection
stories.original_summary: Some ants thrive by choosing numbers over strength. Instead of heavily protecting each worker, they invest fewer resources in individual armor and produce far more ants. stories.fantasy_headline: Secret of the Ant Kingdoms: Many Little Warriors, Not Heavily Armored
stories.fantasy_story: The Ant Clans have a curious battle strategy! Instead of giving each worker ant thick armor, they choose to birth many more tiny, nimble warriors. These vast swarms then use clever group tactics for defense and finding food, proving that strength in numbers can conquer all.

stories.original_headline: A new drug could stop Alzheimer’s before memory loss begins
stories.original_summary: New research suggests Alzheimer’s may start far earlier than previously thought, driven by a hidden toxic protein in the brain. stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Brew Potion to Ward Off Memory-Fading Curse
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Alchemists have crafted a hopeful new potion! It seems the dreaded memory-fading curse begins far earlier, caused by a hidden, foul miasma in the mind. This new elixir, tested on enchanted rodents, can block the early creeping damage and soothe the mind's troubled humors, before the curse truly takes hold.

stories.original_headline: The FCC’s foreign drone ban is here
stories.original_summary: The Federal Communications Commission has banned new drones made in foreign countries from being imported into the US unless the Department of Defense or the Department of Homeland Security recommends them. stories.fantasy_headline: Royal Decree Limits Enchanted Scout-Birds from Foreign Lands
stories.fantasy_story: The Royal Council has issued a new decree regarding enchanted scout-birds! From this day forth, new flying artifacts crafted in faraway kingdoms may not enter the realm, unless expressly approved by the High Marshal's Guard or the Protectors of the Homeland. This measure aims to safeguard the kingdom's magical security.
